products.name: Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max
products.info: The iPhone 12 Pro and iPhone 12 Pro Max are Apple's latest smartphones, offering 5G connectivity, the A14 chip for better performance, an improved camera system with a LiDAR scanner, and MagSafe, all in a new, squared-off design.

products.name: Google Pixel 5
products.info: Google Pixel 5 smartphone comes with a 6.00-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 1080x2340 pixels at a pixel density of 432 pixels per inch (ppi) and an aspect ratio of 19.5:9. Google Pixel 5 is powered by a 1.8GHz octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 765G processor.

products.name: Apple MacBook Air
products.info: Apple MacBook Air comes with a 13.30-inch display that has a resolution of 2560x1600 pixels. It is powered by a Core i3 processor and it comes with 8GB of RAM. The Apple MacBook Air 2020 packs 256GB of SSD storage. Graphics are powered by Integrated Graphics Processor.

products.name: SONY PLAYSTATION 5
products.info: CPU: 3.5GHz, 8-core AMD Zen 2   GPU: 10.3 teraflop RDNA 2 GPU   RAM: 16GB GDDR6   Storage: Custom 825GB SSD   Expansion: NVMe M.2 SSD slot   Disc drive: 4K Blu-ray player   Size: 15.4 x 10.2 x 4.1 inches   Weight: 9.9 pounds

products.name: Apple AirPods Pro
products.info: AirPods Pro have been designed to deliver Active Noise Cancellation for immersive sound, Transparency mode so you can hear your surroundings and a customisable fit for all-day comfort. Just like AirPods, AirPods Pro connect like magic to your iPhone or Apple Watch. And theyâ€™re ready to use straight out of the case.

products.name: Apple iPad Pro
products.info: It comes with a 12.90-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 2732x2048 pixels at a pixel density of 264 pixels per inch (ppi). Apple iPad Pro 12.9-inch (2021) Wi-Fi is powered by an octa-core Apple M1 processor.Apple iPad Pro 12.9-inch (2021) Wi-Fi is based on iPadOS 14 and packs 128GB of inbuilt storage.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G
products.info: There's a new-generation 108-megapixel primary camera,12-megapixel ultra-wide-angle camera and two telephoto cameras. It has Exynos 2100 5G SoC Processor.It has 6.8-inch AMOLED display as well as 5,000mAh battery capacity.

products.name: OnePlus 9 Pro 5G
products.info: OnePlus 9 Pro comes with an AMOLED type 6.78-inch display with rear front consisting of a 48MP Primary Camera, a 50MP Ultra-Wide Angle Lens and an 8MP Telephoto Camera and a 2MP Depth Camera as well as 16MP selfie lens. It has Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor accompanied by an 8GB RAM providing the necessary speed and sustainability.
